Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK representing the administration of a single dose, cycle or complete course of medication to a patient, and its status (e.g. planned, done, abandoned). If required, it may indicate the route(s) (e.g. intravenous) and/or the site(s) of administration (e.g. left arm).

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Administration Medication subset with subset original id 1311000000134.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
